server

Class PartyPlannerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.PartyPlannerService

  • @Path(value="/partyservice")
public class PartyPlannerService
extends java.lang.Object
    Java class used as export for the webservice; The purpose of this class is to redirect the request of an Http Client to a command executable by the server component of the application

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PartyPlannerService()
      Constructor of the partyPlannerService object; Initializes an variable of the ModelManager class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addItems(Party party) 
      java.lang.String addPeople(Party party) 
      Invitation answerInvite(Invitation invitation)
      Method to change the status of an invitation for joining a Party.
      Party createParty(Party party)
      Method used to create a party at the request of an HttpClient; The Party parameter is provided by the web service and serialized using JSON; It references the ModelManager object to execute the command and retrive the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a Party object, meaning the object has been created successfully or null, meaning the procedure failed and was aborted
      java.util.List<Invitation> getInvitations(int personID)
      Method used to retrieve teh user notifications/invites upon login.
      java.util.List<Item> getItemsForParty(int partyId)
      Method used for retrieving the items of a Party stored in the system; It references the ModelManager object to execute the updates and retrieve the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a List in case favorable or null if the procedure failed and was aborted
      java.util.List<Party> getParties(int personId)
      Method used to retrive the parties in which a client participates upon login; As parameter the unique id of the user is used and provided in the path describing the service @PathParam("personId"); For convenience the id is used to create a facade Person object used in the execution of the command; It references the ModelManager object to execute the command and retrive the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a List in case favorable or null in case the procedure failed and was aborted
      Person loginPerson(Person person)
      Method used for login of an already registered user of the system; The Person parameter is provided by the web service and serialized using JSON; It references the ModelManager object to execute the command and retrive the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a Person object, meaning the object has been created successfully or null, meaning the procedure failed and was aborted
      Person registerPerson(Person person)
      Method used for the registration of a new user of the system; The Person parameter is provided by the web service and serialized using JSON; It references the ModelManager object to execute the command and retrive the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a Person object, meaning the object has been created successfully or null, meaning the procedure failed and was aborted
      java.util.List<Person> searchPerson(java.lang.String smth)
      Method used to retrieve certain Users (Person object) that meet the criteria defined by the @PathParam("smth"); It references the ModelManager object to execute the command and retrieve the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a List in case favorable or null in case the procedure failed and was aborted
      boolean setPartyPrivacy(boolean privacy, Party party) 
      Party updateParty(BoxTier2 box)
      Method used to make modifications to a certain Party; The changes include: -adding items; -adding people -removing items -removing people It references the ModelManager object to execute the updates and retrieve the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either the Party object with the wanted changes if in case favorable or null if the procedure failed and was aborted;
      Party updatePartyD(Party party)
      Method used to make modifications to a Party stored in the system; Modifications include: -change title; -change date -change time; -change location -change description -change privacy It references the ModelManager object to execute the updates and retrieve the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either the Party object with te wanted modifications or null if the procedure failed and was aborted;

      • getInvitations

        @GET
 @Path(value="/getNotifications/{personID}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public java.util.List<Invitation> getInvitations(@PathParam(value="personID")
                                                                                                                                                                                 int personID)
        Method used to retrieve teh user notifications/invites upon login. The user for which the procedure is needed is mentioned using the @PathParam("personID") ; It references the ModelManager object to execute the updates and retrieve the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result is either a List or null in case the procedure failed (ex. the personID is invalid) and was aborted
        Parameters:
        personID -
        Returns:
        List

      • answerInvite

        @POST
 @Path(value="/answerInvite")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public Invitation answerInvite(Invitation invitation)
        Method to change the status of an invitation for joining a Party. It references the ModelManager object to execute the updates and retrieve the result which is sent back to the HttpClient using the web service provided; The result of the procedure is either a String "success" in case favorable or "fail" if the procedure failed and was aborted; If the result is "success" the method return the invitation received from the HttpClient or null if the result is "fail".
        Parameters:
        invitation -
        Returns:
